title: FT: Del Howard American Beauty 350 PSA 2
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Del Howard American Beauty 350 PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Have this Del Howard American Beauty available for trade. The card presents excellent for being a 2. One of my personal favorite cards, so no plans to sell him.  However have some specific needs so willing to trade him for the following (can do cash either way):

Hummel EPDG in any condition. Priority #1. If you have one, I’d love to see it!  
Reulbach with glove Sovereign 150 or Hindu
Burch batting Sovereign 150 or Hindu
Pelty Horizontal Hindu

I know the list is specific but that’s what I would be looking for. I’m available via PM, so please reach out!

Thanks
Jeff
